name: AnimeAdvisor
0:
”Alexa, open anime advisor and suggest a good anime of romance genre”
”Alexa, open anime advisor and suggest a good anime”
”Alexa, open anime advisor and tell me about a good anime belonging to romance genre”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: anime advisor
des: This skill will help people by suggesting them an anime out of a selected list of genre such as romance, science fiction, action etc. The anime suggested are some of the best in their respective genre as voted by anime fans around the world.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
